content.rendered:
beauty bar in ajax | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in ajax, ontario. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up

Get Directions

Add Waypoint
show options hide options
Print directions Reset directions
Fetching directions......
Reset directions
Print directions
beauty bar in ajax | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 60 salem road s. #4
  • 905-426-7777
  • ajax@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon.: closed

tue. - wed: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

thu. - fri: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: 10:00 am – 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

I have visited this place for eyebrow threading and upper lips waxing. Serena did amazing job, threading was painless, without a single tear. She is very sweet and polite. Would highly recommend this place if you are ok to spend some$$ for yourself... for great service and experience.read more
Nidhi Thaker
1720897876
Easy to book with lots of time options. Parking is easy. Cost reflects the quality and is fair. Super clean and organized. Staff are great, I feel confident getting my pedicures here.
Sarah B
1720287410
It was a pleasure meeting Taisja. She provided an excellent pedicure service. The new "LOVA|Skin" upgrade worked really well and now my feet are summer ready.
Katie Hutchinson
1719435888
This place is really good and professional, Everybody is friendly. I’ve been coming here for years, Serena is a really great eyebrow threading artist 🧵
Chris
1717553289
Another lovely experience at this location. Jordana gave me an amazing Quickie Pedi today. I’ve also seen Riyu and Serena in the past for the same service and they were wonderful as well. Reception is always friendly. 😊 Thank you for another... great experience!read more
Astra Marie
1716587970
This was my first time here and I really appreciated the above and beyond work treatment I received. I will definitely be returning.
Marvin Mnaymneh
1713891878
I’ve come here for waxing from Serena. She’s absolutely lovely and does a good job. The space is very clean and the staff is quite lovely. Pricing is also competitive compared to other wax bars, but it’s very functional and not so pampering of a... space, but again that is what you’re paying for and you do walk away with a job well done.read more
Sally Al Saaty
1707417810
i loved this place! it was my first time and i love the service i received! the ladies were all so welcoming! riyu and serena were wonderful! definitely going to come back soon! 🧡🧡🧡🧡🧡
mrl gsc
1705114220
Had a manicure today with Chinita she was awesome did a really good job and super friendly. Thanks so much!
Sam
1701908719
I would highly recommend The Ten Spot Whitby location and ask for Kyla she always kills it! Good service super professional, always makes sure you leave and you love it so attention to detail she is the best! Thanks Girl! Can’t wait for my next appt
Fallon Morgan
1693968304
Great pedi overall, nail shape uneven on big toes (too short on right and sharp edge) so a little disappointed about that. Will have to patiently wait for it to grow out. 🙁
Vanessa Fernandes
1689537365
i haven’t been here in a while, but i always go to serena for eyebrow threading and she is amazing! she makes the procedure almost painless and the environment just very welcoming. the front desk staff is great as well, they’re extremely friendly!... will come back soon.read more
Nicole Trinidad
1685221657
‹
›
